overview: "The Intergalactic organization plans to destroy humanity for bad behavior. Only one astronaut rebelled against such a decision and ended up on Earth... He must have time to return to the Intergalactic Base Station in 72 hours in order to save the Earth"
tagline: When you don't know what to do - dance! You never know what will save the world this time.
title: A Spoonful of Stardust
